message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for a limited time at $170. I think you'll find it's a steal at this price!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I would like to counter with an offer of $150 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I can't go below $160. I'm confident you won't find this kind of value anywhere else.
Hello Alice, I understand your position and appreciate your response. I would like to counter with an offer of $155 for the product.
